column1: # Name: Victims of any form of economic violence by a partner since the age of 15, % women
# Definition: This includes the partner preventing her from making independent decisions on family finances, or forbidding her to work outside the home.
# Source: FRA gender-based violence against women survey dataset, 2012
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
